surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]

sentences.english: Full moon on a clear and concrete short life declares.
sentences.chinese: 月圓月缺是具體而微的人生昭示。

sentences.english: Community is specific and real, but fictional too.
sentences.chinese: 社區是具體而微的，又是虛構的。
